name: Sentiment Classification
description: Classify customer messages as positive, neutral, or negative sentiment

testCases.input: I absolutely love this product! It exceeded all my expectations.
The product is okay, nothing special but does the job.
This is terrible quality and completely useless.
Great customer service and fast delivery!
The item arrived damaged and doesn't work properly.
Amazing value for money, highly recommended!
Poor quality materials and disappointing results.
